snippet: The founder of the year-old denim brand with a cult following, Industry Standard, shares pictures from her weekend adventure in West Texas’s picturesque high desert city.
abstract: The founder of the year-old denim brand with a cult following, Industry Standard, shares pictures from her weekend adventure in West Texas’s picturesque high desert city.

headline.main: Nicole Najafi’s Marfa Myths Encounters, From Dev Hynes to a New Tequila Drink
